xml.body:
The seyde deponent saythe that as concernyng such persons as
shuld be Impanyllyd at the seyd Sessyons he sawe apapir of
names of certeyne jurys of the seven hundreth And Aboute Assheforth to nominate of xviii persones delyvered hym by one William Master moyle
Clerke on a saturday at assheforde & his master askyd me Whether they were honest men to passe
for the kyngs & I sayde ye
To the xiiii article
The seyde deponent saythe that he was at master Twayttes the
Wedynaysday next before saynte Mychaell last past & there ytt
was shewyd me certeyn w in wryttyngs my master moyle of
certayn woordes that shuld have ben spokyn by Bland Turnour & other
& sayde there must be Indyctementes made of them and there
he delivered me a fourme of Indyttmentes & they amynacious
To the xvthe Article
The seyde deponent saythe that the sayde master Twayttes was
present with master moyle & me when the seyde mr moyle delyvered
me the seyd fourme of the Indyctmentes & what communycacion we
hadd, the sayd deponent remember the not other than communyng
the makyng of the seyd Indyctmentes
To the xvi article
The seyde deponent sayth that he never hadd other communycacion
then the sayd saturday with Mr moyle or one other for Impanellyng of
any [guest?] that he rememberythe
To the xvii article
The seyde deponent saythe that he rememberythe notÂ eny
had with any man of the chayngyng of the woorde nowe past
or to come or of mattere of ouer ffaythe
